theoryTitle: Luffy's Conqueror's Haki Inherited from Dragon
theoryText: Many fans theorize that Luffy inherited his Conqueror's Haki from his father, Monkey D. Dragon, who is likely also a user of this rare ability. Garp's comment 'He was born with it... just as I thought' suggests that Garp knew about the hereditary nature of this power through Dragon.
author: One Piece Community (General Theory)

theoryTitle: Luffy's Unconscious Haki Use as Setup for Advanced Techniques
theoryText: Fans noted that Luffy's unconscious use of Conqueror's Haki in Episode 478 foreshadows his later ability to use it consciously and even infuse it into his attacks. The fact that he used it purely through emotion and willpower shows that his true potential is far beyond what he currently displays.
author: One Piece Community (General Theory)

theoryTitle: The Hormones Will Have Long-Term Consequences
theoryText: Ivankov's warning that the hormones 'do not repair the damage' led many fans to theorize that Luffy would face serious health consequences after Marineford. Some speculated this would shorten his lifespan or require an extended recovery period, which proved correct when Luffy was unconscious for weeks after the war.
author: One Piece Community (General Theory)
